Sentencas: Mixed ionic-electronic conductors (MIECs) that display high oxide ion conductivity (sigma(o)) and electronic conductivity (sigma(e)) constitute an important family of electrocatalysts for a variety of applications including fuel cells and oxygen separation membranes.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: Often MIECs exhibit sufficient sigma(e) but inadequate sigma(o).
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: It has been a long-standing challenge to develop MIECs with both high sigma(o) and stability under device operation conditions.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: For example, the well-known perovskite oxide Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) exhibits exceptional sigma(o) and electrocatalytic activity.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: The reactivity of BSCF with CO2, however, limits its use in practical applications.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: Here, the perovskite oxide Bi0.15Sr0.85Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BiSCF) is shown to exhibit not only exceptional bulk transport properties, with a sigma(o) among the highest for known MIECs, but also high CO2 tolerance.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: When used as an oxygen separation membrane, BiSCF displays high oxygen permeability comparable to that of BSCF and much higher stability under CO2.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity

Sentencas: The combination of high oxide transport properties and CO2 tolerance in a single-phase MIEC gives BiSCF a significant advantage over existing MIECs for practical applications.
Titulo: A CO2-Tolerant Perovskite Oxide with High Oxide Ion and Electronic Conductivity
